Proven positive impact

A 2018 randomized control trial by the Inter American Development bank found students who performed 3 or more experiments using Lab4Physics had a significant impact on physics knowledge, self-perception, and interest in studying a STEM related career in the future compared to peers who didn't use Lab4Physics
